parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description: The number of instances to create. Valid values: **1** to **100**.

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the subscription. Valid values:

*   true
*   false (default)

parameters.name: AutoUseCoupon
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use vouchers. Default values: true. Valid values:

- true 

- false

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Node Service (ENS) node.

parameters.name: Frequency
parameters.description: The refresh rate. Unit: Hz. Valid values: 30 and 60.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The specification of the Android in Container (AIC) instance. Valid values:

*   aic.cf53r.c1.np
*   aic.cf53r.c2.np
*   aic.cf53r.c3.np
*   aic.cf53r.c4.np
*   aic.cf53r.c5.np
*   aic.cf53r.c6.np
*   aic.cf53r.c7.np
*   aic.cf53r.c8.np
*   ens.a6c2

parameters.name: KeyPairName
parameters.description: The name of the key pair.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Set the value to **PrePaid**. PrePaid specifies the subscription billing method.

>  Only PrePaid is supported.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance.

*   If you leave PeriodUnit empty, the instance is purchased on a monthly basis. Valid values: Day and Month.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Day, you can set Period only to 3.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Month, you can set Period to a value within the range of \[1,9], or set the value to 12.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the subscription duration.

*   If you leave PeriodUnit empty, the instance is purchased on a monthly basis. Valid values: Day and Month.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Day, you can set Period only to 3.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Month, you can set Period to a value within the range of \[1,9], or set the value to 12.

parameters.name: ServerType
parameters.description:
The specification of the ARM server. Valid values:

*   cas.cf53r
*   cas.cf52r
*   cas.cf52m1r
*   cas.tg52g2
*   ens.afq-c2m3i.medium
